Description: Tired of city life young couple Pauline and Alex moved to Paris in just bought their home near Angouleme in a quiet rural department of Charente, to enjoy family happiness. There Pauline gladly immersed in the care of the garden.

She soon falls under the spell of living alone elderly neighbor Gilles, botanist and former forester, who presents her as a gift to a rare and mysterious fast-growing tropical plant from faraway Brazil, requires special care and attention and be sensitive to the moods of others.

Day to day care of the plant takes more and more time Pauline becoming devastated and painful, and the relationship with Alex give a crack ...
